meanings.definition: Work jointly on an activity or project.
meanings.sent1: The students decided to collaborate on their science project to finish it faster.
meanings.sent2: The team members collaborate to create a presentation for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The ants decided to collaborate to build a bridge with leaves and twigs.
meanings.sent4: The colors in the painting collaborate to create a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The musicians collaborate to produce a harmonious melody.

meanings.definition: Cooperate with others in order to achieve a common goal.
meanings.sent1: The neighbors decided to collaborate on a community clean-up event.
meanings.sent2: The countries collaborate to address global issues like climate change.
meanings.sent3: The animals in the forest collaborate to throw a surprise party for the bear.
meanings.sent4: The ingredients in the recipe collaborate to make a delicious dish.
meanings.sent5: The dancers collaborate to perform a stunning routine on stage.
